page.title: 02LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: LEISURE AND RECREATION Grid Squares 4,6,8,12 _ The results showed that the majority of people who went on holiday in 1984-85 went either in Britain or Europe. Through the year leisure activities varied considerably with sports,reading and watching T.V. being the most popular.In terms of entertainment cinema-going was by far the most popular,closely followed by discos and the library. Listed below are some clubs and their venues:_Brownies(Mill Hill County High School);Cubs(Flower Lane,Mill Hill);Scouts(Alyth Gardens);Guides(Mae Beecher Hall,Apex Corner);Jewish Youth Club(Mill Hill County High School);Tennis(Mill Hill L.T. Club Sylvan Avenue);Judo(Canada Villa, Pursley Road)
